## ascatter

```{r, eval=TRUE, include=FALSE}
library(htmltools)
```

```{r, echo=FALSE}
div(
  class = "row",
  div(
    class = "col-md-3",
    img(src = "logo.png")
  ),
  div(
    class = "col-md-9",
    "Virtual Reality 3D Scatter Plot with R."
  )
)
```

#### Installation

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("JohnCoene/ascatter")
```
#### Example

```{r, eval = FALSE}
library(ascatter)

data(population)

aframer::browse_aframe(
  aScatter$
    new(title = "Random")$
    build(
      population, lon, pop, lat, color, size, 
      scale = "2 2 2", valfill="1, 9745.6", 
      yLimit = 0.2, rotation = "0 90 0"
    )$
    plot()
)

```

Hit the button below to view the output.

```{r, echo = FALSE}
tags$a(
  tags$i(class = "fa fa-lg fa-eye"),
  " Demo",
  href = "example.html",
  target = "_blank",
  class = "btn btn-lg btn-primary btn-blue"
)
```
